data.title: Solomons Volunteer Rescue Squad and Fire Department
data.text:
SVRSFD members (left to right) Dr. David Hupp, John Pardoe, CT Thomas, and Rick Hargrave were privileged to participate in the Heroes, Inc. golf tournament last week. Heroes, Inc. is a non-profit that supports the spouses and children of law enforcement officers and firefighters who gave their lives in the line of duty to the greater Washington, D.C. community. The team was sponsored in affiliation ... (Full Story & Photos)

Tonight Company 3 began training in an acquired structure. Tonight we began with 1st due Engine and Truck operations. We will continue training in this structure until it is scheduled for demolition. Training in donated structures is a great way to increase our skills. ... (Full Story & Photos)

Today at 1322 hours Co. 3 was dispatched to Area Box 3-10 in the 1000 Block of San Angelo Dr for the report of a possible oven fire. Engine 31, Engine Tanker 3, and Truck 3 responded as well as Captain 3A and Chief 3A. Captain 3A arrived on scene to find a 2 story single Family with nothing evident. Upon further investigation smoke conditions were found inside the structure coming from the oven itself. ... (Full Story & Photos)

Crews at the station stayed busy Thursday with back to back MVA's. The first was dispatched at 1351 to the parking area of 12100 block of HG Trueman Road. Safety 3a (Bowen) arrived on the scene and established command with a single SUV into a light pole with all occupants out of the car. Crews from Solomons evaluated multiple subjects and cleared with refusals.

At 1436, crews were alerted to the ... (Full Story & Photos)

The Solomons Volunteer Rescue Squad and Fire Department was excited to host the annual Junior Firefighter Training day put on by Calvert County Parks and Recreation. This is an annual event that is hosted by several fire departments in the county. This event is for 3 to 5-year-olds, and we had 27 kids registered. It is always a fun event and a great way to interact with our community. We love to teach ... (Full Story & Photos)
